recipe.title: Salmon Burgers with Ginger Mustard Mayonnaise
ingredients: 3/4 teaspoon finely grated peeled fresh gingerroot
2 teaspoons finely grated peeled fresh gingerroot
2 hamburgers buns, cut sides toasted lightly
instructions: In a small bowl whisk together mayonnaise ingredients.

Make Salmon Burgers: Discard any bones in salmon and finely chop salmon by hand. In a bowl stir together salmon, mustard, gingerroot, soy sauce, and salt and pepper to taste and form into two 3-inch patties. In a non-stick skillet heat oil over moderate heat until hot but not smoking and sauté patties 4 minutes on each side, or until just cooked through. Transfer salmon burgers to buns and top with mayonnaise, onion, and tomato.
